  • Method Details

    • calculateInitialBookValue

      protected double calculateInitialBookValue(int quantity, double price)
      Calculates the initial book value of the investment based on the quantity and price. This method can be overridden by subclasses to include additional calculations if needed.
      Parameters:
      quantity - the quantity of the investment
      price - the price of the investment
      Returns:
      the initial book value
